meanings.sent1: She was outcursing in frustration after stubbing her toe.
meanings.sent2: The angry man was outcursing at the top of his lungs.
meanings.sent3: The outcursing from the neighboring apartment kept her up all night.
meanings.sent4: His outcursing echoed through the empty streets, alarming the passersby.
meanings.sent5: The outcursing in the movie made the scene intense and dramatic.

meanings.definition: The act of cursing loudly or vehemently.
meanings.sent1: His outcursing disturbed the peace of the quiet library.
meanings.sent2: The outcursing from the other room was getting louder and louder.
meanings.sent3: The outcursing in the argument made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent4: The outcursing in the stadium could be heard from miles away.
meanings.sent5: The outcursing in the play added a touch of realism to the scene.
